issues.details: Trump claimed his delegation had a "good" meeting with Putin and that Putin expressed a desire to end the war.

responses.clarification: Trump stated he cannot disclose the details of the meeting, noting that the outcome is unknown and that Putin wants to end the war.

confirmed_facts: Trump said his delegation had a good meeting with Putin on 2025-12-03.
Trump reported that Putin expressed a desire to end the war.
unconfirmed_allegations: The claim that Putin truly wants to end the war.

timeline.event: Trump delegation meets with Putin in Moscow.
Trump publicly comments on the meeting and Putin's stated intentions.
